column7: Advanced study of topics concerning the pathophysiology, diagnosis, and current therapy of diseases which are treated with surgical procedures. 1 or 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate Veterinarian or consent of instructor.
